pages.text: The Millstone can receive Mechanical Power from a Hand Crank, or by an Axle from the top or bottom. When powered, the gear inside turns and crushes materials into a finer form. The Items are ground up one at a time, then ejected horizontally into the world. Millstones with have a $(#F00)Blocked$() notification , to properly rotate it needs space all around it so no full blocks can be next to it!
